column5: Anyone going to Jamaica soon? I have a friend in Mo Bay that will take you fishing if you bring him some fishing gear... The gear is paid for already! All you have to do is deliver it or arrange pick up from your hotel. He's easy to reach on his cell. I have more pics from an other outing. I caught 16 fish in 3 hours last December, went out with him 2x...  http://s1275.photobucket.com/user/Shloim1/library/

I hadn't planned on it but if you want some company I'm more than happy to join you on a free for me trip, I might even kick in a few bucks at least.  The picture of you wearing a winter coat isn't the weather I would expect though. I haven't been in over 10 years and have always wanted to fish there but so little time and it might cut into my poolside happy hours. I saw some monster Bass in a pond on a Golf Course in Runaway Bay. The smallest had to be 5 pounds. Thanks for the lead, you never know.  Johnny D
